install.name: VirtueMart Wishlist Products Module
install.author: 2KWeb Solutions
install.description: This Module will show the User Wishlist and Products

field.name: share_enabled
field.label: Enable Social Sharing
field.description: Select Yes if you want to enable Social Sharing

field.name: num_favorites
field.label: Number of Products to Display
field.description: Here you can define the number of Favorites Products to display in the module.

field.name: cache
field.label: Set Cache Timeout
field.description: Here you can set the Cache Timeout for the module (in seconds). Set to zero if you want to disable it

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: Here you can apply a specific class suffix for this module (table.moduletable), custom module styling are allowed

field.name: class_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: Here you can apply a specific class suffix for the menu items
